description:
http://anidb.net/ch78912 [Rokuro] is from a family of exorcists who remove the evil Kegare, but his real dream is to be a singer, a soccer player, or anything other than an exorcist. When another exorcist name http://anidb.net/ch78911 [Benio] arrives, Rokuro is suddenly inflamed with competitive spirit and decides to put his natural knack to good use. Their rivalry gets more complicated when they both learn they are the destined "Twin Star Exorcists," two ultimate fighters fated to marry and create the prophesied child who will eliminate all the Kegare in the world.
Source: ANN

REGULAR.description:
Enmado Rokuro has great talent as an exorcist, but because of trauma in his past he has given that pursuit up. That`s when he meets Adashino Benio, head of the famous Adashino exorcist clan, who has moved to Tokyo from Kyoto. What will become of these two after their fateful meeting?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaderleri Birbirine Bağlı İkili: Çocukla Kız Tanışır
Les deux êtres de la destinée
The Destined Two: Boy Meets Girl
Unmei no Futari: Boy Meets Girl
運命の二人 BOY MEETS GIRL

REGULAR.description:
Benio has moved into the Seika dormitory, which puts her into conflict with Rokuro after their unpleasant first encounter. Soon a strange individual arrives at the dorm clad only in a pair of underpants. This turns out to be the leader of all exorcists, the Chief Exorcist Tsuchimikado Arima. After inviting the members of the dorm to the Five Mirror Chamber, he asks Rokuro and Benio to battle in front of exorcist authorities from around Japan. Benio wants to test Rokuro`s strength, but he still wants nothing to do with being an exorcist.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Intersection of Twin Stars: A Fateful Fight
双星交差 A FATEFUL FIGHT

REGULAR.description:
Benio quickly becomes the center of attention after transferring to Rokuro and Mayura`s middle school. When a Kegare attacks between classes, Benio decides to leave while Rokuro claims that their studies should take precedence over exorcist duties. But is that how he really feels?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: すれ違い A HERO`S WORTH

REGULAR.description:
When Ryogo runs into more trouble than expected during a Kegare exorcism, a desperate Rokuro turns to the one person he thinks can really help: Benio. 
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Sound of Magano: Bothersome Twosome

REGULAR.description:
When the kids from an elementary school soccer team are suddenly transported to Magano by Kegare, Rokuro joins Benio, Atsushi, and Shinnosuke to go to Magano and save them. But in the middle of the battle, painful memories overwhelm Rokuro, and he`s unable to fight. Just then, one of the highest ranking Exorcists, the "Vermilion Bird" of the Twelve Guardians, Ikaruga Shimon, appears.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Juuniten Shou Suzaku: The Guardian Shimon
On İkili Muhafız, Parlak Kızıl Kuş: Muhafız Shimon
Twelve Guardians, Vermilion Bird: The Guardian Shimon
十二天将 朱雀 THE GUARDIAN SHIMON

REGULAR.description:
With Benio constantly leaving school for no given reason, Mayura starts to worry about her new classmate. And Rokuro starts getting back into the swing of things by joining the others on a regular Kegare exorcism.
Source: crunchyroll

Arima returns to Tokyo to give the Twin Star Exorcists a trial to test their skills. But it`s not the kind of test they were anticipating, with an unexpected reward.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 新たなる試練 UNBELIEVABLE GAME

REGULAR.description:
Mayura and Benio debate whether or not Rokuro should continue fighting, and an unpleasant figure from Rokuro`s past arrives to test his renewed dedication to being an exorcist. 
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ろくろの気持ち SHOCKING CONFESSION

REGULAR.description:
With the truth about Rokuro exposed to Benio, the Twin Star Exorcists are confronted by someone who shares a connection to both of them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Intertwining Tragedies: Tragedy Comes with Smile
Kousaku Suru Higeki: Tragedy Comes with Smile
İç İçe Geçmiş Felaket: Gülümsemeyle Gelen Felaket
交錯する悲劇 TRAGEDY COMES WITH SMILE

REGULAR.description:
After being confronted by Yuuto, the Twin Star Exorcists are desperate to get stronger in preparation for future battles, but Benio`s old master Subaru has a different kind of training in mind.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: En İyisini Yapın, Yeni Evliler: Fantastik Anlar
Subaru no Shugyou: The Bewitching Guardian
すばるの修行 THE BEWITCHING GUARDIAN

REGULAR.description:
Subaru of the Twelve Guardians thinks that Benio and Rokuro need to understand each other better, but the Twin Star Exorcists aren`t convinced and insist on conventional combat training.  The debate comes to head in the form of a game of hide and seek: if Benio and Rokuro can track Subaru down before sunset, she`ll provide the training they`re asking for.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Beni Rahat Bırakın: Basaralı Çocuk Kamui
Do Your Best, Newlyweds: Fantastic Moments
新婚さんおきばりやす FANTASTIC MOMENTS

REGULAR.description:
Benio and Rokuro square off against the massively powerful Kamui, but are hopelessly outmatched. What makes this Kegare so uniquely dangerous? And can the Twin Star Exorcists survive?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Beni Rahat Bırakın: Basaralı Çocuk Kamui
Give Me a Break: Basara Boy Kamui
勘弁しろし BASARA BOY KAMUI

REGULAR.description:
Benio has a vendetta against the incredibly powerful Basara, Kamui. Rokuro tries to reason with her as she insists on fighting him no matter what the cost. Can the Twin Star Exorcists overcome their most deadly enemy yet by working together?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kimi no Yuuki, Watashi no Yuuki: Zero Millimeters Apart
Senin Cesaretin, Benim Cesaretim: Sıfır Milimetre Uzakta
Your Courage, My Courage: Zero Millimeters Apart
君の勇気, 私の勇気 ZERO MILLIMETERS APART

REGULAR.description:
It`s Tanabata at the Seika Dorm, and everyone is reminiscing while they think about what their wishes for the future will be.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yukata to Hoshi to Negaigoto: Tanabata Special
Yukatas, Stars, and Wishes: Tanabata Special
浴衣と星と願い事 TANABATA SPECIAL

REGULAR.description:
Ryogo gets introduced to an attractive young exorcist by Fushihara, an exorcist from the neighboring area, causing him to question whether or not exorcists should pursue romantic relationships in face of the otherworldly threats that menace their lives. 
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Goodbye to Being Alone: The Awakening of Love
Hitoribocchi ni Sayounara: The Awakening of Love
ひとりぼっちに さようなら THE AWAKENING OF LOVE

REGULAR.description:
After harsh words from Seigen, the Twin Stars are frustrated with how powerless they feel. Mayura decides to help cheer her exorcist friends up, in spite of a warning from her father...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: As an Exorcist: Salvation Then Wailing
Onmyouji to Shite: Salvation Then Wailing
陰陽師として SALVATION THEN WAILING

REGULAR.description:
Rokuro has sworn to defeat Yuto. But... how? The Twin Star Exorcists look at the facts and try to find a way to strengthen their odds against an opponent that outclasses them in nearly every way.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le sceau rouge hérité de mon maître
Shi ga Kureta Akai Akashi: New Talisman from Master
The Red Emblem Master Gave Me: New Talisman from Master
師がくれた赤い証 NEW TALISMAN FROM MASTER

REGULAR.description:
Rokuro has sworn to defeat Yuto. But... how? The Twin Star Exorcists look at the facts and try to find a way to strengthen their odds against an opponent that outclasses them in nearly every way.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La veille de la bataille finale
On the Eve of Battle: Triumph over Fear
決戦前夜 TRIUMPH OVER FEAR

REGULAR.description:
It`s all been leading up to this. With their new Resonance abilities, the Twin Star Exorcists take the fight directly to Ijika Yuto. Will it be enough to defeat the twisted, evil exorcist?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Both Sin and Impurity: The 10 Seconds Decision
Tsumi mo Kegare mo: The 10 Seconds Decision
罪もけがれも THE 10 SECONDS DECISION

REGULAR.description:
Yuto has been dominating the Twin Star Exorcists so far, but can help from an unexpected source change the course of their battle?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Futari no Michi: To the Future with Us Two
Our Path: To the Future with Us Two
ふたりの道 TO THE FUTURE WITH US TWO

REGULAR.description:
Two years have passed since their battle with Yuto, and the Twin Star Exorcists have gotten better with age. But when they find something unexpected in Magano, there`s no telling what it could mean for their future.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Rebirth of the Twin Stars: Sweetie Fairy

REGULAR.description:
The hellish world of Magano, home of the Kegare, has begun to leak into our reality. Can the Twin Star Exorcists stop the growing influence before it spells doom for the town of Narukami?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It`s Impure, Y`Know? Philosophical Filthy Seraphim
ケガれてんじゃ~ん PHILOSOPHICAL FILTHY SERAPHIM

REGULAR.description:
The Twin Stars head out of town to seal a Dragon Spot, and Benio is confronted with the infamy caused by her brother. 
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sousei Nishi e: Hard to Be Mother
Westward, Twin Stars: Hard to Be Mother
双星 西へ HARD TO BE MOTHER

REGULAR.description:
The Twin Stars` tour across Japan to seal the Kegare-spawning Dragon Spots makes a detour to an amusement park, and Sae makes a new friend that Benio and Rokuro aren`t happy about.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kegare no Mita Yume: What Is Beautiful?
The Kegare`s Dream: What Is Beautiful?
ケガレの見た夢 WHAT IS BEAUTIFULL?

REGULAR.description:
The Twin Stars head down to Nagoya and encounter a baseball stadium that has been taken over by a Basara.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ten Gen Kuu Ware: Come Back! Southpaw
天・元・空・我 COME BACK! SOUTHPAW

REGULAR.description:
The Twin Star Exorcists meet a pair of twin Basara brothers, whose teamwork might be a match for our heroes` powers... And the mastermind behind the Dragon Spots finally reveals himself.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sousei vs Sousei: Basara Twins` Strings
Twin Stars vs Twins: Basara Twins` Strings
双星VS双生 BASARA TWINS` STRINGS

REGULAR.description:
While the Twin Stars tour Japan, Mayura tries to step up her skills as an exorcist. 
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Himitsu no Mayura-chan: Mayura`s Secret Lesson
ひみつの繭良ちゃん MAYURA`S SECRET LESSON

REGULAR.description:
A Dragon Spot in Kumano results in a brief detour before the Twin Stars and Sae arrive in Kyoto, and they meet the strongest member of the Twelve Guardians.
Source: crunchyroll

The head of the Exorcist Union is attacked by the Basara responsible for the the Dragon Spots. And the Twin Star Exorcists finally learn just where Sae came from.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Promise with Sae: Missing Exorcist Master
Sae to no Yakusoku: Missing Exorcist Master
さえとの約束 MISSING EXORCIST MASTER

REGULAR.description:
With the secret behind the Dragon Spots and Sae`s origin revealed, the path to salvation is clear. But are the Twin Stars willing to part ways with the girl who`s become like a daughter to them? And if they`re not, can they help the Twelve Guardians resist the flood of Kegare coming through the Dragon Spot?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Itsumademo Egao de: Lovely Smile Forever
いつまでも笑顔で LOVELY SMILE FOREVER

REGULAR.description:
Kinako wakes up alone in the Seika Dorm after the trip to Kyoto. As he searches for Benio, he reminisces about how they first met. 
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Because I`m with You: Wai Wa Kinako Ya!
Je serai à vos côtés - Je suis Kinako
Soba ni Iru kara: Wai wa Kinako Ya!
そばにいるから WAI WA KINAKO YA!

REGULAR.description:
The Twin Stars reflect on their past, and Rokuro begins to question his own origins.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Into Chaos: Seeking the Past, Seeking the Future
Konton no Naka ni: Seeking the Past, Seeking the Future
混沌の中に SEEKING THE PAST, SEEKING THE FUTURE

REGULAR.description:
Kuranashi prepares the next phase of his plan, and sends the Basara who have allied with him to take on the Twelve Guardians.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Moro no Ongaeshi: I Want You to Eat Me
The Master Repays a Favor: I Want You to Eat Me
師[もろ]の恩返し I WANT YOU TO EAT ME

REGULAR.description:
Two of the Twelve Guardians, Zeze Miku and Sada Sakura, take on the ravenous Basara named Moro.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mei Combi ja Nee! Wachi vs Washi & Watashi
On est pas la meilleure équipe ! Moro vs Miku et Sakura
The Greatest Duo?! Wachi vs Washi & Watashi
名コンビじゃねぇ! WACHI vs WASHI&WATASHI

REGULAR.description:
A Basara is targetting the Twin Star Exorcists, and the only one standing in his way is Shimon. But will the winged guardian save Rokuro and Benio, or be their ultimate downfall?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fukushuu no Kairaishi: I Am Not Alone
The Puppeteer`s Revenge: I Am Not Alone
復讐の傀儡師 I AM NOT ALONE

REGULAR.description:
Chijiwa has wrapped Shimon, along with the rest of the school, in his marionette strings to force them to attack the Twin Stars. Can Rokuro, Benio, and Mayura find a way to free their friends, or will they be forced to fight?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mamorubeki Mono: What Is Really Important?
What Must Be Protected: What Is Really Important?
守るべきもの WHAT IS REALLY IMPORTANT?

REGULAR.description:
It`s the quiet before the storm as the Twin Stars and their friends have a moment of rest before Kuranashi unleashes his plot.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Koi no Machi Maiagaru: Tell Me Honest Feelings
La ville de l`amour se soulève
Spirits Soaring in the City of Romance: Tell Me Honest Feelings
恋の町 舞い上がる TELL ME HONEST FEELINGS

REGULAR.description:
Kuranashi unveils his deadly game, and if the Twin Star Exorcists don`t win, it could mean the death of everyone in the town of Narukami.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Narukami`s Most Ill-Fated Day: No Way to Run, No Place to Hide
Narukamimachi Saikyou no Hi: No Way to Run, No Place to Hide
Un jour funeste au quartier Narukami
鳴神町最凶の日 NO WAY TO RUN,NO PLACE TO HIDE

REGULAR.description:
Mayura and Seigen face off against Kuranashi, but the Basara has a wicked trick up his sleeve. Does the daughter-father team stand a chance against the mastermind of the attack on Narukami?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jiai no Reijuu: Daughter`s Fight! Father`s Delight
The Sacred Beast of Love: Daughter`s Fight! Father`s Delight
慈愛の霊獣 DAUGHTER`S FIGHT! FATHER`S DELIGHT

REGULAR.description:
The Twin Star Exorcists fight the giant Kegare ravaging Narukami while it floats in the sky, as the Twelve Guardians try to make sure the floating city can return to the ground safely.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Twin Stars` Hearts Dance: Finally They Kissed?
双星ときめく FINALY THEY KISSED?

REGULAR.description:
With the Twelve Guardians caught in Kuranashi`s trap, it`s now up to the Twin Star Exorcists to free them. But what chance do they stand against the newly powerful Basara?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Juuni Tenshou, Otsu! Have a Nice Nightmare, 12 Guardians
La chute des douze généraux célestes
The Twelve Guardians Fall! Have A Nice Nightmare, 12 Guardians
十二天将, 墜つ! HAVE A NICE NIGHTMARE, 12GUARDIANS

REGULAR.description:
The threat Kuranashi had posed is over, but the Twin Stars don`t get to celebrate for long when an old foe returns.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Furusato wa Magano: Say It Ain`t So, Rokuro!
I Come from Magano: Say It Ain`t So, Rokuro!
故郷は禍野 SAY IT AIN`T SO, ROKURO!

REGULAR.description:
Rokuro is reeling from what he has learned about his past, and Head Exorcist Arima explains the full scope of what Abe no Seimei set in motion, over a thousand years ago.
Source: crunchyroll

After learning about his true nature from Arima, and what it could potentially mean for the entire world,  Rokuro makes a decision.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ai Suredo Tooku: Farewell, My Precious
Distanced Despite Their Love: Farewell, My Precious
愛すれど遠く FAREWELL,MY PRECIOUS

REGULAR.description:
Rokuro has decided to fight Yuto alone. Without Benio, and with the other higher ranked exorcists out of commission, does he stand a chance?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hitorikiri no Futari: Lonely Twin Exorcist
The Couple Alone: Lonely Twin Exorcist
ひとりきりの二人 LONELY TWIN EXORCIST

REGULAR.description:
As they battle over the fate of the world, Yuto reveals the nature of his obsession with Rokuro.
Source: crunchyroll

Rokuro has become the Cataclysm King, and will soon be responsible for cleansing nearly all of humanity from the Earth. Abe no Seimei offers Benio a way to turn him back to normal, but at what cost?
Source: crunchyroll

Abe no Seimei is about to create his perfect new world, and it means a gruesome end for the our current one. It`s up to the Twin Star Exorcists and their friends to stop him.
Source: crunchyroll

Rokuro tries to rescue Benio but even if he succeeds, can the Twin Star Exorcists prevent the birth of Abe no Seimei`s new world?
Source: crunchyroll

Abe no Seimei, the greatest Exorcist of all time, intends to wipe humanity`s yin away in order to create a world where there will be no more Kegare... or free will, or individuality. Can the Twin Star Exorcists stop him?
Source: crunchyroll
